fields.Intro Text:
Goals

Create a flexible fulfillment routing and data manipulation system across 20–30 stores using OrderDesk, enabling seamless integration with multiple fulfillment partners and improving overall order flow and tracking.

Contributions

Configured complex OrderDesk rules to process and route orders from stores built on various e-commerce platforms. Developed workflows to transform order data for compatibility with primary and secondary warehouse partners, as well as dropship and made-to-order vendors. Implemented systems for passing shipping data back to storefronts and for triggering automated post-order notifications.

Outcomes

Streamlined fulfillment across a diverse ecosystem of partners and platforms. Improved data reliability and fulfillment partner compatibility. Enhanced customer experience with timely shipping updates and tailored post-purchase notifications.

Goals

Redesign and redevelop https://pay.sendwyre.com/ in a week.

Contributions

Because I needed to build this app quickly, I focused on utilizing Formik for validation and state management with Material IO as a base for form styling.

Outcomes

The company went with the first person to turn in the assessment. I learned a lot about integrating from technology into a React application.

Goals

Contribute to the development of an interactive landing page for UC Merced, collaborating with Friends of the Web to bring advanced design concepts to life and expand experience with React and collaborative development workflows.

Contributions

Implemented a dynamic landing page based on provided design files, featuring interactive card elements with CSS 3D transforms to achieve depth and movement. Converted static HTML/CSS components into reusable React components within a Next.js framework. Integrated smoothly with an established codebase and contributed to the collaborative development process.

Outcomes

Delivered a visually engaging and technically dynamic landing page that met project design goals. Strengthened expertise in React and Next.js development and deepened experience working with modern, collaborative workflows. Helped establish a positive working relationship with the Friends of the Web team.

fields.Project Title: Hide Expedited Shipping Methods for Dropship Items
fields.Intro Text:
Goals

Improve customer experience and delivery accuracy by dynamically hiding unsupported shipping methods for specific drop ship items in the e-commerce cart.

Contributions

Developed a JavaScript application layered on top of the e-commerce platform. Built logic to parse the cart object, identify item vendors, and determine eligible shipping methods per vendor. Implemented dynamic hiding of unsupported shipping options and customer-facing alerts when restrictions apply.

Outcomes

Eliminated common fulfillment issues caused by incompatible shipping selections. Reduced customer dissatisfaction due to delayed shipments. Provided a more transparent and accurate checkout experience aligned with partner fulfillment capabilities.
fields.Gallery Folder Name: Hide Expedited Shipping Methods for Dropship Items

fields.Project Title: Auto Convert Order Status: New To In Progress
fields.Intro Text:
Goals

Automate order status updates to reduce manual work, ensure billing accuracy, and streamline the sync between e-commerce and financial systems.

Contributions

Developed a Python-based automation tool to regularly fetch order data via the e-commerce platform API. Implemented logic to detect when orders had been imported into the fulfillment system and were older than two hours. Automated the status update from "New" to "In-Progress," triggering necessary downstream processes including billing syncs. Leveraged AI tools to support the coding and deployment of this project.

Outcomes

Eliminated repetitive manual order status updates by customer service. Ensured timely and accurate status transitions required for billing processes. Improved operational efficiency across e-commerce, fulfillment, and finance workflows.
fields.Gallery Folder Name: Auto Convert Order Status: New To In Progress

fields.Intro Text:
Goals

Automate and standardize the flow of shipping data from diverse vendors back into the e-commerce platform to reduce manual work and improve customer-facing tracking updates.

Contributions

Developed a suite of APIs to process inconsistent shipping data from multiple fulfillment partners. Implemented workflows using MailParser to extract shipment details from email and feed them to custom API endpoints. Built logic for data validation, cleaning, and formatting across various shipment types (order-level, item-level). Integrated with OrderDesk to centralize shipping data and leverage its native sync with storefront systems. Additionally implemented direct API integrations for vendors providing compatible data formats.

Outcomes

Significantly reduced manual data entry and order tracking errors. Provided near real-time shipping status updates to customers, improving satisfaction and transparency. Established a scalable architecture for handling varied shipping data across multiple vendor relationships.

Goals

Develop a flexible, version-controlled pop-up system to promote free product add-ons without requiring frequent manual code updates in the e-commerce platform.

Contributions

Created a dynamic JavaScript-based pop-up script hosted on GitHub for version control and easy updates. Implemented cache-busting via timestamp injection. Designed the script to accept key content attributes (image URL, title text, destination URL) as inputs, enabling highly customizable pop-ups across different pages. Built the system to be lightweight and reusable across multiple store implementations.

Outcomes

Enabled fast deployment of promotional pop-ups with no need for manual front-end edits. Provided marketing and merchandising teams with a flexible tool to drive add-to-cart conversions. Improved maintainability and scalability of promotional UX elements across the e-commerce ecosystem.

Goals

Build a dynamic API and front-end system to validate, display, and track Forbes Travel Guide Award redemptions — while also powering a flexible e-commerce experience for associated product sales with tiered restrictions.

Contributions

Architected API and UI to interface with award redemption and e-commerce flows. Designed Airtable-based database for ingesting and validating award data. Developed front-end logic to conditionally display and restrict options per property, award level, and product type. Built UI for pulling associated product data across multiple tiers (4-star, 5-star, unrestricted) with handling, airing, and lookup systems. Implemented post-checkout database updates to lock redemptions and sync product purchasing logic across store platforms.

Outcomes

Seamless redemption experience tailored to property type and award level. Unified interface for controlled product sales linked to award eligibility. Secure, automated validation and tracking across award and e-commerce systems. Scalable solution supporting multiple store platforms and future cycles.

fields.Project Title: Automotive Service Excellence Technician Validation API
fields.Intro Text:
Goals

Build a validation system within an e-commerce platform to verify buyer eligibility for products based on certified automotive technician credentials.

Contributions

Developed front-end interface that fetches technician certification data from an external ASC database. Implemented logic to match returned certifications with product eligibility requirements. Created dynamic messaging to block ineligible purchases and guide eligible users through checkout.

Outcomes

Enabled secure, automated validation of product eligibility based on technician certifications. Improved compliance with product distribution requirements. Provided clear user experience for both eligible and ineligible customers during purchase flow.

fields.Project Title: Automotive Service Excellence Technician Validation API

Outcomes

Enabled secure, automated validation of product eligibility based on technician certifications. Improved compliance with product distribution requirements. Provided clear user experience for both eligible and ineligible customers during purchase flow.

Goals

Improve payment clarity and reduce chargebacks and disputes by introducing dynamic acknowledgements during checkout for various payment types.

Contributions

Developed a front-end acknowledgement system integrated into the e-commerce payment flow. Implemented required checkboxes and messaging for credit card transactions to notify customers that charges will appear under a parent company name. Extended the system with custom acknowledgements for ACH payments, credit checks, balance fees, and purchase orders. Designed the flow to conditionally enable checkout progression only after appropriate acknowledgements are given.

Outcomes

Reduced chargebacks and post-order disputes related to payment naming discrepancies. Improved legal clarity and customer understanding of payment terms. Enabled greater flexibility in supporting varied payment types while protecting company financial processes.

Goals

Streamline internal operations and project intake by building a system to consistently collect and route key project information across the organization.

Contributions

Developed a custom WordPress-based forms system using Formidable to capture structured project data (creative briefs, website requests, project scoping forms, and more). Built an integration pipeline via Zapier to pass form data into monday.com, enabling automated task creation and assignment. Designed workflows to reduce miscommunication and improve project clarity across teams and leadership.

Outcomes

Improved consistency and quality of project intake. Enabled seamless transition from form submission to actionable tasks in monday.com. Reduced operational friction and communication gaps across creative, development, and management workflows.

Goals

Convert an existing design into functioning HTML, CSS & Javascript.

Contributions

I developed this to be highly adaptable. Mobile responsive development considered and flexibility in terms of reusable javascript functions for optimized page load.

Outcomes

I refind my skills around writing functional javascript in a reusable way. The slideshow of images for each product can be imported with minimal code repetition.
